item.title: Resume
item.description: CV Updated Nov 2022 Studies I come from a small city in the french speaking part of Switzerland. In 2018 I left the shores of lake Neuch√¢tel for those of Zurich. I studied Computer Science at ETH for a few years, and more recently went on an exchange semester at the University of Edinburgh in Scotland. Experiences and Projects BACHELOR PROJECT I wrote my thesis at the research group of Prof.
